entry.name: {templatename}
entry.wikitext: +section title={{name}} +row +col-6 ESRI Topo :br {{map width="100%" height="80vh" zoomLevel=8 linked=true listEntries="false" height=300px width=100% layerFillOpacity=0 layerFillColor=#fff doPopup=false doFeatureSelect=false layer=esri.topo mapCenter="inherit" }} -col +col-6 Open Street Map :br {{map width="100%" height="80vh" zoomLevel=8 linked=true listEntries="false" height=300px width=100% layerFillOpacity=0 layerFillColor=#fff doPopup=false doFeatureSelect=false layer=osm mapCenter="inherit" }} -col -row +row +col-6 Google Hybrid :br {{map width="100%" height="80vh" zoomLevel=8 linked=true listEntries="false" height=300px width=100% layerFillOpacity=0 layerFillColor=#fff doPopup=false doFeatureSelect=false layer=google.hybrid mapCenter="inherit" }} -col +col-6 Shaded Relief :br {{map width="100%" height="80vh" zoomLevel=8 linked=true listEntries="false" height=300px width=100% layerFillOpacity=0 layerFillColor=#fff doPopup=false doFeatureSelect=false layer=esri.shaded mapCenter="inherit" }} -col -row -section
